summary: This is an email from Peri Mornington, a solicitor at Manleys Solicitors, transmitting an attached correspondence. The email is marked as strictly private and confidential, not for publication or dissemination, and includes a legal disclaimer.

persons.name: Peri Mornington
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting an attached correspondence on behalf of Manleys Solicitors.

events.title: Email Transmission of Confidential Correspondence
events.description: Peri Mornington sends an email with an attached confidential correspondence, marked strictly private and not for publication.

keyFacts: The email is from Peri Mornington, a solicitor at Manleys Solicitors, and is marked 'STRICTLY PRIVATE & CONFIDENTIAL - NOT FOR PUBLICATION OR DISSEMINATION'.
The email transmits an attached correspondence file named 'Facts_-_July_t_2022.pdf'.
The email includes a legal disclaimer stating it is confidential, legally privileged, and intended solely for the addressed recipient.
